T_0.title: Zero'th Comment
T_0.description: Concurrently is a Node Package Manager that will help you in avoiding the need to execute several commands to launch your servers. You could run all commands on separate terminals, but I'm sure you, like most people, wish there was an easier solution. As the name implies, this package allows you to execute your client and backend server simultaneously with a single command.

T_1.title: Add single command for client & server
T_1.description: In the package.json of your root directory, add these scripts below All that remains is to put your new tool to the test!
